text: This chapter shall be applied and construed to effectuate its general purpose to make uniform the laws with respect to the subject of the chapter among states enacting it.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 45-2605.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-113, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-201.

Uniform Law

This section is based upon § 6 of the Uniform Conservation Easement Act.   See 12 Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE § 42-205

Current through December 11, 2012
